sentences.sContent: ...the operation of the market taken to lunatic extremes.

synos.tran: 疯狂的；精神错乱的；愚蠢的

remMethod.val: lun(月亮) + atic → 人们认为精神病与月亮的盈亏有关 → 疯子； Luna原指罗马神话中的月亮女神

trans.tranOther: If you describe someone's behaviour or ideas as lunatic, you think they are very foolish and possibly dangerous
someone who behaves in a crazy or very stupid way – often used humorously
